 @font-face {
     font-family: "Roboto-Thin";
     font-weight: 700;
     src: url("//fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v18/3KAd02OzFSDbt78HTOt2og.eot?#iefix");

                             <div class="s_usaAWRichTextClickableSkin_richTextContainer s_usaAWRichTextClickableSkinrichTextContainer" id="comp-itkqv1fk_MediaLeft_PhotoPost__0_0_0_0_textrichTextContainer" style="height:initial">
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span>
                                Pictures taken Sunday, April 22, 2018.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7" style="">
                               <span style="">
                                What a wonderful season...and still going. The Kiosk and Lodge are now closed but many people are still skiing on more than a foot of base snow. This weeks twenty plus degree temperatures may erode the base but the main trails are still surprising firm from being groomed so many times by the Big Cat. Skiing in April is definitely a novelty so get out there if you can...not many people can say they have skied in late April anywhere in the whole country of Canada.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7" style="">
                               <span style="">
                                A short message from your KNC Executive.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7" style="">
                               <span style="">
                                What a season we have had!!!!...
                               </span>
                              </p>
                             </div>

                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Friday April 13th.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                And its a lucky Friday the 13th up here at KNC !
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                New snow.. 8 cm yesterday and a fresh groom has set up the trails for spectacular spring skiing conditions !!
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Currently Sunny with a bluebird sky and a light breeze.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Skiers are reporting firm and quick skate conditions !! The classic tracks are in great condition with last nights groom and overnight cold to set up !
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                So come on up and take in a few more runs yet !!
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Angela
                               </span>
                              </p>

                              <p class="font_7">
                               Report at 03-Apr, 11:36AM MDT
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Tuesday, April 3 - The conditions this morning are excellent!! Mid-winter conditions.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                The Groomer has groomed the main runs and the snow is beautiful. Come on up. The temp is currently -6C with sunshine and no wind. Today's high is set to go to 4C. Have a great ski!
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                Update - 10:30 - Temp is -5C with a little breeze. The first skiers are coming in with rave reviews about the skiing... "perfect" "Beautiful" are what I'm hearing as they wiz by the kiosk.
                               </span>
                              </p>
                              <p class="font_7">
                               <span style="">
                                What a day of skiing this is. If you would like to ski in conditions like mid January, com...
                               </span>
                              </p>

2018.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">What a wonderful season...and still going. The Kiosk and Lodge are now closed but many people are still skiing on more than a foot of base snow. This weeks twenty plus degree temperatures may erode the base but the main trails are still surprising firm from being groomed so many times by the Big Cat. Skiing in April is definitely a novelty so get out there if you can...not many people can say they have skied in late April anywhere in the whole country of Canada.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">A short message from your KNC Executive.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">What a season we have had!!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;With our first major snow in early November and no major thaws through the winter, we have been able to groom trails and offer great ski conditions to our members for a record 5 1\/2 months!&nbsp;&nbsp;Officially we are closed&nbsp;for the season as of yesterday and the kiosk and lodge will be locked. We will however, keep the waxing hut open for awhile longer as, believe it or not, some people are still skiing!!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;Those with equipment in lockers may want to retrieve gear as we do not cover theft\/loss for any reason.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Thank you&nbsp;to<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;staff&nbsp;(groomers and kiosk attendants) for your dedicated, competent and cheerful assistance<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;many volunteers&nbsp;who help with leadership, coaching, management, cutting\/hauling firewood, grant writing, races, evening kiosk operations etc. etc. etc.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;members&nbsp;who make it all possible.&nbsp;&nbsp;Again this year we have broken our record with over 1200 members which means we are one of the largest Nordic Clubs in B.C.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">This summer\/fall&nbsp;&nbsp;you can expect to see some on-going work happening including<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- completion of trail work started last Fall including signage updates<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- possibly construction of a new timing shed<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- renovation of the kiosk building to accommodate the rental skis we have purchased.&nbsp;<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- general maintenance to existing buildings and equipment<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">A major challenge at the forefront this&nbsp;&nbsp;year was&nbsp;Parking!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;We will continue to work with the City of Kimberley to try to come up with some longer term solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Please support us by voicing\/writing your ideas\/concerns to the City directly!<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">If you have any expertise with grant writing, we need your help!&nbsp; please let us know if you are some time for this.&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Have a great Summer..... see you in the Fall hopefully at our AGM!!!!<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Respectfully from your KNC Executive.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Kimberley Nordic has had the longest season of any cross country ski area in all of the East Kootenays for several years running now. Great place to live, great place to ski.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Have a great summer everyone...biking is almost here...and keep your fingers crossed for another fabulous ski year next year.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">The weather station and Web Cam will be turned off over the summer months and the Lodge is available for rent of course. KNC has many events hosted at our club over the summer. This year the web site will do it's best to keep you updated on activities over the summer.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Round the Mountain, Sunday, June 24th, 2018 coming up.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Thanks for the great season...<\/span><\/hatul>","links":[],"version":3},"author":"KNC","coverImageData":{"_type":"CoverImageData","coverImageType":"photo","video":{"_type":"wix:Video","videoId":"","videoType":"","thumbnail":""},"photo":{"_type":"wix:Image","title":"IMG_1401","src":"9190cb_d8c8bb1530c34d029e7a5a810c5dd06e~mv2_d_4000_3000_s_4_2.jpg","width":4000,"height":3000},"isHD":false,"isHeroImage":false},"description":{"_type":"wix:RichText","text":"","links":[],"version":1},"mobileTitle":"Closed for the Season...but what a Season it has been...5 1\/2 months of Wonderful Skiing !!","_iid":"5ae25d35e6ac71224df4fc6a","_hash":"d56be4e27da7d901783271de928f24e4","_createdAt":"2018-04-26T23:13:57.879Z","_updatedAt":"2018-05-04T04:09:04.328Z","permalink":"2018\/04\/26\/Closed-for-the-Seasonbut-what-a-Season-it-has-been5-12-months-of-Wonderful-Skiing-","permalinkVersion":"2","defaultPost":false,"categories":[]},"5ad100ffe6ac7153f3c23129":{"_type":"MediaPost","title":"Friday the Lucky Thirteenth...More new snow...more grooming !!","categoryIds":[],"date":{"_type":"wix:Date","iso":"2018-04-13T19:15:38.685Z"},"text":{"_type":"wix:RichText","text":"<hatul><span style=\"\">Friday April 13th.&nbsp;<\/span><\/hatul><hatul><span style=\"\">And its a lucky Friday the 13th up here at KNC ! <\/span><\/hatul><hatul><span style=\"\">New snow.. 8 cm yesterday and a fresh groom has set up the trails for spectacular spring skiing conditions !! <\/span><\/hatul><hatul><span style=\"\">Currently Sunny with a bluebird sky and a light breeze.&nbsp;<\/span><\/hatul><hatul><span style=\"\">Skiers are reporting firm and quick skate conditions !! The Kiosk and Lodge are now closed but many people are still skiing on more than a foot of base snow. This weeks twenty plus degree temperatures may erode the base but the main trails are still surprising firm from being groomed so many times by the Big Cat. Skiing in April is definitely a novelty so get out there if you can...not many people can say they have skied in late April anywhere in the whole country of Canada.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">A short message from your KNC Executive.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">What a season we have had!!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;With our first major snow in early November and no major thaws through the winter, we have been able to groom trails and offer great ski conditions to our members for a record 5 1\/2 months!&nbsp;&nbsp;Officially we are closed&nbsp;for the season as of yesterday and the kiosk and lodge will be locked. We will however, keep the waxing hut open for awhile longer as, believe it or not, some people are still skiing!!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;Those with equipment in lockers may want to retrieve gear as we do not cover theft\/loss for any reason.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Thank you&nbsp;to<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;staff&nbsp;(groomers and kiosk attendants) for your dedicated, competent and cheerful assistance<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;many volunteers&nbsp;who help with leadership, coaching, management, cutting\/hauling firewood, grant writing, races, evening kiosk operations etc. etc. etc.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- our&nbsp;members&nbsp;who make it all possible.&nbsp;&nbsp;Again this year we have broken our record with over 1200 members which means we are one of the largest Nordic Clubs in B.C.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">This summer\/fall&nbsp;&nbsp;you can expect to see some on-going work happening including<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- completion of trail work started last Fall including signage updates<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- possibly construction of a new timing shed<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- renovation of the kiosk building to accommodate the rental skis we have purchased.&nbsp;<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">- general maintenance to existing buildings and equipment<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">A major challenge at the forefront this&nbsp;&nbsp;year was&nbsp;Parking!!!&nbsp;&nbsp;We will continue to work with the City of Kimberley to try to come up with some longer term solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Please support us by voicing\/writing your ideas\/concerns to the City directly!<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">If you have any expertise with grant writing, we need your help!&nbsp; Great place to live, great place to ski.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">Have a great summer everyone...biking is almost here...and keep your fingers crossed for another fabulous ski year next year.<\/span><\/hatul><hatul style=\"\" ><span style=\"\">The weather station and Web Cam will be turned off over the summer months and the Lodge is available for rent of course.
